name: Legend of Kalmar
description:
Press the left mouse button to move, and press the escape button to close the game.

Made in 2 hours with the Godot engine for Rigid Jam 15, with the theme Underwater.

I spent the first 20 minutes or so designing the art assets, then about half an hour trying to figure out how to figure out how rigid bodies work.

After I gave up on that, I just decided to use kinematic bodies because of the time limit, and got the game done in just under two hours.
